First we load the library and data: 
```{r}
library(devtools)
library(roxygen2)
setwd("..")
document()
devtools::install() 
library(manhattanPlot)
?manhattanPlot
d = read.csv('examples/data/males_small_data.csv')
manhattanPlot(d, animationSpeed = 50)
```

Take a quick peak at the data: 
```{r}
head(d)
```


...and plot: 
```{r}
manhattanPlot(d)
```
